listAlertsQuery: MATCH (a:Account)-[:SENT]->(t:Transaction)-[:RECEIVED]->(receiver:Account), (a)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(c:Customer)-[:RESIDES_AT]->(addr:Address)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(j:Jurisdiction) WHERE j.riskLevel = "High" RETURN distinct elementId(c) AS value ORDER by value LIMIT 5
name: High Risk Jurisdiction
alertDetailQuery: MATCH path1 = (alert:Alert)-[:ON]->(c:Customer), path2 = (a:Account)<-[:HAS_ACCOUNT]-(c)-[:RESIDES_AT]->(addr:Address)-[:LOCATED_IN]->(j:Jurisdiction), path3 = (a)-[:SENT]->(t:Transaction)-[:RECEIVED]->(receiver:Account) WHERE alert.alertId = $alertId RETURN apoc.coll.toSet([path1, path2, path3]) AS result
